metadata.name: JavaTest
metadata.author: Mihael
metadata.desc: Testing task library elements to compile and run code

component.source:
<project> <include file="cogkit.xml"/>
<!-- copies a java source file over to a remote host, compiles and runs it --> <set name="host" value="arbat.mcs.anl.gov"/>
<!-- copy file --> <task:transfer srcfile="Test.java" desthost="{host}" provider="gridftp"/>
<!-- compile --> <task:execute host="{host}" provider="gt2" executable="/homes/dsl/javapkgs/linux/j2sdk1.4.2_05/bin/javac" arguments="Test.java"/>
<!-- run --> <task:execute host="{host}" provider="gt2" executable="/homes/dsl/javapkgs/linux/j2sdk1.4.2_05/bin/java" arguments="-cp . Test" stdout="test.stdout" stderr="test.stderr"/>
<!-- transfer back stdout and stderr --> <task:transfer srchost="{host}" srcfile="test.stdout" provider="gridftp"/> <task:transfer srchost="{host}" srcfile="test.stderr" provider="gridftp"/>
<!-- print output and error --> <echo> <concat> <string>STDOUT: </string> <readFile file="test.stdout"/> </concat> </echo> <echo> <concat> <string>STDERR: </string> <readFile file="test.stderr"/> </concat> </echo>
</project>
